events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle on the morning of March 31. The driver hit a pole causing visible damage to the front bumper.
The claim was categorized under 'Auto Accident' after verifying keywords such as vehicle, accident, and collision in the initial report.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to handle the case. The customer was informed promptly about their dedicated point of contact.
Acknowledgement of claim receipt was sent to the customer, ensuring them that the process is underway and assistance is available.
Requested relevant documents including police report, photographs of the damaged vehicle, and insurance details to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all necessary documents in a timely manner, facilitating the smooth continuation of the claim process.
Investigation began focusing on the circumstances of the collision and assessing vehicular damage as reported by the customer.
The accident investigation was completed, confirming the fault and validating the extent of damage claimed.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs of the vehicle based on the investigation outcome and damage assessment.
The customer provided positive feedback regarding the clarity of communication and the prompt handling of the claim.
The claim was formally approved, authorizing payment for the repair within the agreed settlement amount.
Payment was issued promptly to the repair shop to cover the costs as per the approved claim settlement.
The claim was officially closed following confirmation that all payments were processed and the customer was satisfied with the resolution.
